front.title: YANG Modules for describing System Capabilities and Yang-Push Notification Capabilities

abstract.t: This document defines two YANG modules: The module ietf-system-capabilities provides a structure that can be used to specify YANG related system capabilities for servers. The module can be used in conjunction with YANG Instance Data to make this information available at implementation-time. The module can also be used to report capability information from the server at run- time. The module ietf-notification-capabilities augments ietf-system- capabilities to specify capabilities related to "Subscription to YANG Datastores" (YANG-Push).
